inclusion.criterion: moderate to severe head injury (Glasgow Coma Scale 3-12)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Admission within 48 hours of post traumatic event
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of renal or liver dysfunction
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe sepsis with multi organ failure
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis, but no mention of diabetes mellitus or significant abdominal or chest injuries requiring major surgery.
